description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) uses per-victim links for hosting malicious archives, such as ZIP files, in services such as SharePoint to prevent other entities from retrieving them.(Citation: Trellix Darkgate 2023)

external_references.description: Ernesto Fern√°ndez Provecho, Pham Duy Phuc, Ciana Driscoll & Vinoo Thomas. (2023, November 21). The Continued Evolution of the DarkGate Malware-as-a-Service. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
